IF(SUPPORT_AUDIO AND USE_VAMP)
	INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(.)
	FILE(GLOB DIRLIST * )
	FOREACH(LIBDIR ${DIRLIST})
  	  IF(IS_DIRECTORY ${LIBDIR})
  	      ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(${LIBDIR})
		GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(LIBNAME ${LIBDIR} NAME_WE)
		IF(TARGET ${LIBNAME})
			SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES("${LIBNAME}" PROPERTIES FOLDER "${FOLDERNAME}/vamp")
		ENDIF()
  	  ENDIF()
	ENDFOREACH()
	MESSAGE("[X] vamp plugin SDK")
ELSE()
	MESSAGE("[ ] vamp plugin SDK")
ENDIF()
